title: UNISOUND System for VoxCeleb Speaker Recognition Challenge 2023. (arXiv:2308.12526v1 [eess.AS])
abstract: This report describes the UNISOUND submission for Track1 and Track2 of VoxCeleb Speaker Recognition Challenge 2023 (VoxSRC 2023). We submit the same system on Track 1 and Track 2, which is trained with only VoxCeleb2-dev. Large-scale ResNet and RepVGG architectures are developed for the challenge. We propose a consistency-aware score calibration method, which leverages the stability of audio voiceprints in similarity score by a Consistency Measure Factor (CMF). CMF brings a huge performance boost in this challenge. Our final system is a fusion of six models and achieves the first place in Track 1 and second place in Track 2 of VoxSRC 2023. The minDCF of our submission is 0.0855 and the EER is 1.5880%.

Title: UNISOUND System for VoxCeleb Speaker Recognition Challenge 2023. (arXiv:2308.12526v1 [eess.AS])
Abstract: This report describes the UNISOUND submission for Track1 and Track2 of VoxCeleb Speaker Recognition Challenge 2023 (VoxSRC 2023). We submit the same system on Track 1 and Track 2, which is trained with only VoxCeleb2-dev. Large-scale ResNet and RepVGG architectures are developed for the challenge. We propose a consistency-aware score calibration method, which leverages the stability of audio voiceprints in similarity score by a Consistency Measure Factor (CMF). CMF brings a huge performance boost in this challenge. Our final system is a fusion of six models and achieves the first place in Track 1 and second place in Track 2 of VoxSRC 2023. The minDCF of our submission is 0.0855 and the EER is 1.5880%.
translated_title: UNISOUND系统对VoxCeleb Speaker Recognition Challenge 2023的贡献
translated_abstract: 本报告描述了UNISOUND在VoxCeleb Speaker Recognition Challenge 2023（VoxSRC 2023）的Track1和Track2中的提交。我们在Track 1和Track 2上提交了相同的系统，该系统仅使用VoxCeleb2-dev进行训练。我们为挑战任务开发了大规模ResNet和RepVGG架构。我们提出了一种一致性感知的得分校准方法，通过一致性测量因子（CMF）利用声音特征的稳定性来提高相似性得分的稳定性。CMF使我们在该挑战中获得了巨大的性能提升。我们最终的系统是六个模型的融合，在VoxSRC 2023的Track1中获得第一名，在Track2中获得第二名。我们的提交的minDCF为0.0855，EER为1.5880%。
tldr: UNISOUND团队在VoxCeleb Speaker Recognition Challenge 2023中提交的系统通过一致性感知的得分校准方法和大规模ResNet和RepVGG架构的使用，在Track1中获得第一名，在Track2中获得第二名，并实现了较低的minDCF和EER。
en_tdlr: The UNISOUND team achieved first place in Track 1 and second place in Track 2 of the VoxCeleb Speaker Recognition Challenge 2023 by using a consistency-aware score calibration method, large-scale ResNet and RepVGG architectures, with low minDCF and EER.
